#summary &uarr; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesU

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &uarr;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&Uarr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/219f/index.htm U+0219F].
  * `&uArr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21d1/index.htm U+021D1].
  * `&uarr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2191/index.htm U+02191].
